explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a new model (HTLSTM) for modeling temporal sequences of online information, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed HTLSTM is a deep learning model that leverages hierarchical and time-aware mechanisms for sequence modeling.
explanations.neural network: HTLSTM is a type of neural network, specifically a variant of LSTM, which is used for sequence modeling.
explanations.representation learning: The paper discusses encoding the scale-free nature of sequences in a time-aware fashion, which involves learning representations of the data.
explanations.long short-term memory: The proposed model is a variant of LSTM (Hierarchical Time-Aware Hyperbolic LSTM), indicating direct relevance to LSTM techniques.
explanations.LSTM: The model name includes LSTM, and it is explicitly mentioned as a key component of the proposed approach.
